text: Allah vakadzikisa shoko rakanakisisa, Gwaro (Qurâ€™aan), zvidimbu zvaro zvakafanana nezvimwe (mune zvakanaka uye muhuchokwadi) uye zvichidzokorodzwa-dzokorodzwa. Makanda eavo vanotya Tenzi vavo anobvunda kubva mariri (pavanoriverenga kana pavanorinzwa). Pedzezvo ganda ravo nemoyo yavo yozvininipisa mukurangarira Allah. Iri ndiro gwara raAllah. Vanotungamirira wavanoda naro. Uye uyo munhu Allah wavanoita kuti arasike, kwaari haana mutungamiri
